Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?Visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [254]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [261]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [262] [263] [264] [265] [266] [267]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [257]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [262]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [263] [264] [265] [266] [267] [268]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [269]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥? People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [274] [275]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [280]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [285]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [292]

Greece | Greece Mount Athos - Special permit required (4 days: 25 euro for Orthodox visitors, 35 euro for non-Orthodox visitors, 18 euro for students). There is a visitors' quota: maximum 100 Orthodox and 10 non-Orthodox per day and women are not allowed. [331] [332]
India | India . Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [333] [334] [335] [336] [337] [338]

North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang - Special permit required. People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving).
Malaysia | Malaysia . Sabah and Sarawak - Visa not required. These states have their own immigration authorities and passport is required to travel to them, however the same visa applies. [341]
Maldives | Maldives outside Mal茅 - Permission required. Tourists are generally prohibited from visiting non-resort islands without the express permission of the Government of Maldives. [342]
Russia | Russia . Special authorization required for several closed cities and regions in Russia require special authorization. [343]
Saudi Arabia | Saudi Arabia Mecca and Medina - Special access required. Non-Muslims and those following the Ahmadiyya religious movement are strictly prohibited from entry.
Sudan | Sudan . Darfur - Separate travel permit is required. [344]
Sudan | Sudan outside Khartoum - All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [265]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 3 months. [274]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [275] [276] [277] [278]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Saudi Arabia | Saudi Arabia - Non-Muslims are not allowed in Mecca or Medina.

Australia | Australia . Ashmore and Cartier Islands - Special authorisation required. [381]
Colombia | Colombia . San Andr茅s and Leticia - Visitors arriving at Gustavo Rojas Pinilla International Airport and Alfredo V谩squez Cobo International Airport must buy tourist cards on arrival.
Ecuador | Ecuador . Gal谩pagos - Online pre-registration is required. Transit Control Card must also be obtained at the airport prior to departure. [383]
Eritrea | Eritrea outside Asmara - To travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [384]
Fiji | Fiji . Lau Province - Special permission required. [385]
Greece | Greece Mount Athos - Special permit required (4 days: 25 euro for Orthodox visitors, 35 euro for non-Orthodox visitors, 18 euro for students). There is a visitors' quota: maximum 100 Orthodox and 10 non-Orthodox per day and women are not allowed. [386] [387]
India | India . Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [388] [389] [390] [391]
Iran | Iran . Kish Island - Visa not required. [392]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan . Closed cities - Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [393]
Malaysia | Malaysia . Sabah and Sarawak - Visa not required. These states have their own immigration authorities and passport is required to travel to them, however the same visa applies. [394]
Maldives | Maldives outside Mal茅 - Permission required. Tourists are generally prohibited from visiting non-resort islands without the express permission of the Government of Maldives. [395]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang - Special permit required. People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving).
Russia | Russia - Several closed cities and regions in Russia require special authorization. [396]
Saudi Arabia | Saudi Arabia Mecca and Medina - Special access required. Non-Muslims and those following the Ahmadiyya religious movement are strictly prohibited from entry.
Sudan | Sudan . Darfur - Separate travel permit is required. [397]
Sudan | Sudan outside Khartoum - All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Tajikistan | Tajikistan . Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous Province - OIVR permit required (15+5 Tajikistani Somoni ) and another special permit (free of charge) is required for Lake Sarez . [398] [399]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan . Closed cities - A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [400]
United States | United States . Closed city of Mercury , Nevada , United States - Special authorization is required for entry into Mercury.
United States | United States . United States Minor Outlying Islands - Special permits required for Baker Island , Howland Island , Jarvis Island , Johnston Atoll , Kingman Reef , Midway Atoll , Palmyra Atoll and Wake Island . [401] [402] [403] [404] [405] [406] [407]
Venezuela | Venezuela . Margarita Island - Visa not required. All visitors are fingerprinted. [408]
Vietnam | Vietnam . Ph煤 Qu峄慶 - Visa not required for 30 days. [409]
Yemen | Yemen outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden - Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [410]

India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Mizoram , Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [294] [295]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [252]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [260]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [261] [262] [263] [264] [265] [266]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [267]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [272] [273]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [278]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [282]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [256]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit. Darfur 鈥?Separate travel permit is required. [260]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [263]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [264] [265] [266] [267] [268] [269]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [270]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [275] [276]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [281]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [286]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [297]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [253]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [258]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [259] [260] [261] [262] [263] [264]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [265]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [270] [271]

India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [249]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [254]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [255] [256] [257] [258] [259] [260]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [262]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving) [ citation needed ]
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [267] [268]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [273]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [278]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [288]

Fetching data for Jordan...
Fetching Jordan successfully
Israel | Persons may be denied entry if entering with a passport containing visas or stamps issued by Israel . [11]
France | Although no visa requirements exist, apply the relevant regulations of France or Spain , whichever must be transited to reach Andorra. [13]
United States | Permanent residents of the United States and Canada and holders of valid visas issued by the United States , Canada , Schengen Area and the United Kingdom do not require a visa for an allowed stay of up to 30 days. A visa waiver fee of US$100 (~71 JOD ) is payable upon arrival. [18]
Armenia | Due to a state of war with Armenia , the Government of Azerbaijan bans the entry of citizens from Armenia , as well as citizens of any other country who are of Armenian descent , to the Republic of Azerbaijan [40] (though there have been exceptions, notably for Armenia's participation at the 2015 European Games held in Azerbaijan [41] ).
Saudi Arabia | Passengers with a visa issued by Saudi Arabia and permitted entry by land can obtain a 24-hour transit visa on arrival if continuing their journey by land using the King Fahd Causeway . [49]
Croatia | Holders of short stay and transit visas issued by Croatia , Cyprus and Romania can enter Bulgaria for the duration of their visa. [93]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [255]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [260]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [261] [262] [263] [264] [265] [266]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [267]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥? People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [272] [273]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [278]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [282]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [293]

Fetching Lebanon successfully
Iran | Iran lifted visa requirements for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon on 29 July 2015. [2]
Indonesia | Indonesia lifted visa requirements for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon on 7 October 2015. [3]
Qatar | Qatar lifted visa requirements for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon on 23 June 2017. [4] [5] [6]
Antigua and Barbuda | Antigua and Barbuda , Cote d'Ivoire , Kyrgyzstan , Lesotho , Ethiopia , and Tajikistan introduced an Electronic Visa facility for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon . [7] [8] [9] [10]
Egypt | Egypt lifted visa requirements for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon arriving at Borg El Arab Airport in Alexandria , Hurghada Airport or Sharm El Sheikh Airport for South Sinai resorts on a charter flight on 7 February 2018 [11] [12] [13]
Benin | Benin introduced visa on arrival facility for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon on 15 March 2018. [14]
Iraq | Iraq lifted visa requirements for citizens of the Republic of Lebanon on 24 October 2018. [15]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [330]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [337]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [338] [339] [340] [341] [342]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [344]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [249]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [254]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [255] [256] [257] [258] [259] [260]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [261]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥? People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [266] [267]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [272]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [277]
Colombia | Colombia 鈥?Visitors arriving at San Andr茅s and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [288]

Greece | Greece Mount Athos 鈥?Special permit required (4 days: 25 euro for Orthodox visitors, 35 euro for non-Orthodox visitors, 18 euro for students). There is a visitors' quota: maximum 100 Orthodox and 10 non-Orthodox per day and women are not allowed. [309] [310]
India | India . Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [311] [312] [313] [314] [315] [316]
Iran | Iran . Kish Island 鈥?Visa not required. [317]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan . Closed cities 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [318]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?Special permit required. People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving).
Malaysia | Malaysia . Sabah and Sarawak 鈥?Visa not required. These states have their own immigration authorities and passport is required to travel to them, however the same visa applies. [319]
Maldives | Maldives outside Mal茅 鈥?Permission required. Tourists are generally prohibited from visiting non-resort islands without the express permission of the Government of Maldives. [320]
Russia | Russia . Several closed cities and regions in Russia 鈥?Special authorization required. [321]
Saudi Arabia | Saudi Arabia Mecca and Medina 鈥?Special access required. Non-Muslims and those following the Ahmadiyya religious movement are strictly prohibited from entry.
Sudan | Sudan . Darfur 鈥?Separate travel permit is required. [322]
Sudan | Sudan outside Khartoum 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Tajikistan | Tajikistan . Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous Province 鈥?OIVR permit required (15+5 Tajikistani Somoni ) and another special permit (free of charge) is required for Lake Sarez . [323] [324]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan . Closed cities 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [325]
United States | United States . Closed city of Mercury , Nevada , United States 鈥?Special authorization is required for entry into Mercury.
United States | United States . United States Minor Outlying Islands 鈥?Special permits required for Baker Island , Howland Island , Jarvis Island , Johnston Atoll , Kingman Reef , Midway Atoll , Palmyra Atoll and Wake Island . [326] [327] [328] [329] [330] [331] [332]
Venezuela | Venezuela . Margarita Island 鈥?Visa not required. All visitors are fingerprinted. [333]
Vietnam | Vietnam . Ph煤 Qu峄慶 鈥?Visa not required for 30 days. [334]
Yemen | Yemen outside Sana'a or Aden 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana'a or Aden . [335]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [252]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [259]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [260] [261] [262] [263] [264] [265]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [266]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [271] [272]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [248]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [251]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥? People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [254] [255]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [260]

Greece | Greece Mount Athos 鈥?Special permit required (4 days: 25 euro for Orthodox visitors, 35 euro for non-Orthodox visitors, 18 euro for students). There is a visitors' quota: maximum 100 Orthodox and 10 non-Orthodox per day and women are not allowed. [375] [376]
India | India . Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [377] [378] [379] [380] [381] [382]
Iran | Iran . Kish Island 鈥?Visa not required. [383]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan . Closed cities 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [384]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?Special permit required. People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving).
Malaysia | Malaysia . Sabah and Sarawak 鈥?Visa not required. These states have their own immigration authorities and passport is required to travel to them, however the same visa applies. [385]
Maldives | Maldives outside Mal茅 鈥?Permission required. Tourists are generally prohibited from visiting non-resort islands without the express permission of the Government of Maldives. [386]
Saudi Arabia | Saudi Arabia Mecca and Medina 鈥?Special access required. Non-Muslims and those following the Ahmadiyya religious movement are strictly prohibited from entry.

Sudan | Sudan outside Khartoum 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.

Azerbaijan | Azerbaijan : As a result of the Nagorno-Karabakh War between Azerbaijan and Armenia , Azerbaijan refuses entry to individuals of Armenian descent who hold Russian Federation or other passports. [406] It also strictly refuses entry to foreigners in general whose passport shows evidence of entry into the self-proclaimed Nagorno-Karabakh Republic , declaring them a so-called personae non gratae . [407]

Processing table 2 ...
Bhutan | For a maximum stay of 15 days if the application was submitted at least 2 and a half months before arrival and if the clearance was obtained.
Cameroon | Must hold approval from the General Delegate of Security.
Eritrea | Must have a sponsor who must submit an application at least 48 hours before arrival.
Gabon | Holders of entry authorisation issued by the state authorities.
Liberia | Available only if arriving from a country without a diplomatic mission of Liberia and if a sponsor obtained an approval.
Nigeria | Holders of a visa application who have a Nigerian company taking responsibility for them.
Sierra Leone | Holders of a visa approval.
Sudan | Holders of an entry permit issued by the Ministry of Interior.
Turkmenistan | Holders of an invitation letter of the local company that was approved by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [248]

India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. Montenegro | Montenegro : 30 days;
S茫o Tom茅 and Pr铆ncipe | S茫o Tom茅 and Pr铆ncipe : 15 days;
Serbia | Serbia : 90 days.
Mexico | Mexico : 180 days.
Canada | Canada : 6 months
New Zealand | New Zealand : 90 days
United Arab Emirates | United Arab Emirates :
United Kingdom | United Kingdom : +Indefinitely
New Zealand | New Zealand : Indefinite . Note: may apply for Permanent Residency in New Zealand after satisfying two year's residence with an Australian Resident Visa in New Zealand. Australian Resident Visa in New Zealand (Indefinite Visa) is granted at the New Zealand border in the form of an entry stamp, if the holder leaves New Zealand the Visa would end and the time spent would not count towards satisfying the Two Year's Residence requirement in order to become a New Zealand Permanent Resident. Australian Resident Visa is the name of the Visa given to Australian Permanent Residents or Australian Citizens upon arrival in New Zealand.

Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [261] [262] [263] [264] [265] [266]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) 鈥?visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [230]
Sudan | Sudan 鈥?All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit. [233]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong 鈥?Visa not required for 90 days. [234]
India | India 鈥?Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Mizoram , Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [235] [236] [237]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan 鈥?Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [238]
North Korea | North Korea outside Pyongyang 鈥?People are not allowed to leave the capital city, tourists can only leave the capital with a governmental tourist guide (no independent moving)
Palestine | Palestine 鈥?Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [243]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan 鈥?A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [248]
Yemen | Yemen 鈥?Special permission needed for travel outside Sana鈥檃 or Aden . [251]

Bahamas | Bahamas - Admission permitted with prior completion of Travel Health Visa Application, which requires a negative COVID-19 test. [3]
Bangladesh | Bangladesh 鈥?Requires negative COVID-19 test. Home quarantine is required even with a negative result
Belgium | Belgium 鈥?Admission to Schengen Area refused indefinitely, except residents, family members of EU citizens, medical personnel, and people responsible for transport of goods.
Botswana | Botswana 鈥?Negative COVID-19 test required. Quarantine required for those who are not tested.
Brazil | Brazil 鈥?Admission restricted via land borders. Entry via air unrestricted. [4]
Brunei | Brunei - Admission refused.
Bulgaria | Bulgaria 鈥?Admission refused unless exempted from the entry restrictions ordered by the Ministry of Health on 3 August 2020. Long-term visa or residence permit holders are permitted to enter, but must self-isolate for 14 days unless arriving from the EU/EEA after a two-week stay there.
Cambodia | Cambodia 鈥?$2000 deposit required and negative COVID-19 test. $90 local health insurance must be bought on arrival
Canada | Canada 鈥?Admission refused for nonessential travel, land borders closed indefinitely
Chile | Chile 鈥?鈥渁ffidavit of travelers鈥?required and negative COVID-19 test required. Visitors also need health insurance.
China | China 鈥?Admission refused for nonessential travel. Admission granted to those with valid residence permits for work, family visitation, or personal emergencies; crew-members of international flights, vessels, or trains with valid visas; or those with diplomatic, service, or courtesy visas. Those with valid visas of any type issued after March 26, 2020 are not refused entry. All visa waiver policies suspended, including visa-free transit and visa-free entry to Hainan Province . All travelers entering on commercial flights are required to submit evidence of a negative RT-PCR test for SARS-CoV-2 at least three days before boarding their flight. Other types of tests for the virus are not accepted. [5] [6] [7] [8]

Denmark | Denmark 鈥?Admission to Schengen Area refused indefinitely, except residents, family members of EU citizens, medical personnel, and people responsible for transport of goods. Entry refused into Greenland and Faroe Islands until April 13.
El Salvador | El Salvador 鈥?Negative COVID-19 test required
Estonia | Estonia 鈥?Admission refused effective March 17. Right of entry will remain for citizens and those with a right of residence, as well as foreign citizens whose next of kin live in Estonia. Transit is allowed for foreigners not showing signs of COVID-19 . A mandatory two-week quarantine will be set for anyone entering the country.

Israel | Israel 鈥?Admission refused, except for new immigrants with an Aliyah visa. All arriving individuals must be tested at the airport. They must then be housed in a government funded hotel or remain under home isolation for 10 days. Arrivals will then take a second test and upon confirmation of a negative result will be released from the isolation. If an arrival refuses then the arrival must remain in isolation for an additional 4 days.
Italy | Italy 鈥?Admission to Schengen Area refused from noon 17 March until April 30, except residents, family members of EU citizens, medical personnel, and people responsible for transport of goods.
Japan | Japan 鈥?Admission refused, except those with valid re-entry documentation and those meeting certain family, professional, or medical criteria. [13]
Jordan | Jordan 鈥?Valid health insurance, a PCR test taken on arrival, and an tracking app download is required for entry. [14]

Lithuania | Lithuania 鈥?Admission refused, except those with residence permit.
Luxembourg | Luxembourg 鈥?Admission to Schengen Area refused from noon 17 March until April 30, except residents, family members of EU citizens, medical personnel, and people responsible for transport of goods.
Malaysia | Malaysia 鈥?Admission refused for nonresidents. Quarantine required for residents.
Malta | Malta 鈥?14-day quarantine required.
Mexico | Mexico 鈥?No negative COVID-19 test is required. Admission refused for those traveling by land
Mongolia | Mongolia 鈥?Admission refused.
Netherlands | Netherlands 鈥?Admission to Schengen Area refused from noon 17 March until April 30, except residents, family members of EU citizens, medical personnel, and people responsible for transport of goods.
New Zealand | New Zealand 鈥?Admission refused for nonresidents. 14-day managed quarantine required for residents. [15]
North Korea | North Korea 鈥?Admission refused.
Norway | Norway 鈥?Admission refused.
Oman | Oman 鈥?Tourist visas suspended indefinitely.
Panama | Panama 鈥?Admission refused.
Philippines | Philippines 鈥?Admission refused, except spouses and children of Filipino nationals. [16]
Poland | Poland 鈥?Admission refused, except for those possessing residence or work permits. 14 days quarantine required.
Russia | Russia 鈥?Admission refused.
Singapore | Singapore 鈥?Admission refused for nonresidents. Quarantine required for residents.
Slovakia | Slovakia 鈥?Admission refused for nonresidents. Quarantine required for residents.

South Korea | South Korea - 14 day quarantine required even with a negative COVID-19 test

Suriname | Suriname 鈥?Admission refused.

Tajikistan | Tajikistan 鈥?Admission refused.
Thailand | Thailand 鈥?Admission refused, except residents.
Tunisia | Tunisia 鈥?Proof of negative PCR test and mandatory 14 day quarantine on arrival required. If a test is taken on the 7th day and it is negative, you can leave quarantine early [17]
